entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the evening then west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
